description.title: Mirzad
description.welcome: Mirzad Digital Wallet is a secure and user-friendly tool for managing and storing your cryptocurrencies, providing fast and easy transactions with high security.

btn.rulesCheckBox: I Agree to Mirzad Privacy Policy.

step1.label: Email
step1.title: Please check your email for the verification code. Enter the code below to verify your account.

step2.label: Phone number
step2.title: Please enter you phone number and  check your inbox for the verification code. Enter the code below to verify your account.

step3.label: National number
step3.title: Enter your national ID to verify your identity and receive the Shahkar code.
